channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman set on fire during fight on CTA train in Chicago's Loop
item.description: An arson investigation is underway after a woman was set on fire while riding a CTA Blue Line in Chicago's Loop on Monday night.

item.title: House to vote on full Epstein files' release -- the move Johnson fought for months
item.description: The bill is expected to pass in the House with Republicans' support.

item.title: Mystery deepens after 4 family members die at popular tourist site
item.description: Eleven people have been detained in connection with the deaths of four members of the same family in Istanbul, the state-run Anadolu news agency said.

item.title: SNAP is back, but millions of Americans could lose benefits due to new restrictions
item.description: Just as SNAP benefits were reinstated for millions of Americans following the reopening of the federal government, many are now set to permanently los...

item.title: Group of South Carolina lawmakers look at the most restrictive abortion bill in the US
Federal immigration agents will expand enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh, mayor says
item.description: Federal immigration authorities will expand their enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh as soon as Tuesday.

item.title: One of 25 abducted Nigerian girls escapes captivity
item.description: One of the 25 schoolgirls abducted from a dormitory in northwestern Nigeria’s Kebbi state has escaped and returned home

item.title: Roblox announces measures to strengthen protections for minors
item.description: Facing pressure from states and families, Roblox will require players to use AI-powered technology that helps verify their age.

item.title: Japan says jets scrambled as China flew drone near island close to Taiwan
item.description: Tension between Japan and China has escalated over the new Japanese leader's suggestion Tokyo could intervene militarily if Beijing attacks Taiwan.

item.title: Trump has elaborate welcome planned for Saudi crown prince's White House visit
item.description: President Trump hopes to seal major business and security deals with MBS during Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's White House visit.

item.title: Tennessee judge blocks Trump’s use of National Guard in Memphis but gives time for government appeal
WATCH: Banned college basketball player reveals details of gambling scheme
item.description: Former University of New Orleans basketball player Dae Dae Hunter is speaking out after being banned for life from the NCAA as a result of his partici...

item.title: WATCH: Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
item.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.
